conclusion: Analyze paths liquid will take from baffles A, B, C, and D to containers E, F, or G.
Liquid from A will move straight down and enter container E.
Liquid flows downward from B (Light Blue).
Liquid from B will move straight down and enter container F.
Liquid from C will move straight down and enter container G.
Liquid flows downward from D (Light Gray).
Liquid from D will move straight down and enter container G.
Container E will receive liquid from baffle A.
Container F will receive liquid from baffle B.
Container G will receive liquid from baffles C and D.
Liquid from A flows into container E.
Liquid from B flows into container F.
Liquid from C and D flows into container G.
